title: AMIGA FORMAT Magazine (Nearly) Complete Issue 1-136
description:
Amiga Format was a British computer magazine for Amiga computers, published by Future plc. The magazine lasted 136 issues from 1989 to 2000. The magazine was formed when, in the wake of selling ACE to EMAP, Future split the dual-format title ST/Amiga Format into two separate publications (the other being ST Format). At the height of its success the magazines sold over 170,000 copies per month, topping 200,000 with its most successful ever issue.

See the included Readme.txt for source sites.

These (high quality) scans of Amiga Format magazine were compiled from existing scans from various sources. You can find many of them, as well as other magazine scans at these sites:

archive dot org (archive.org/details/amigaformatmagazine)
retromags dot com (www.retromags.com/magazines/category/uk/amiga-format/)
oldgamemags dot com (www.oldgamemags.com/amiga-format/)

Please go check them out and give credit to them. All I did was compile them and seed a torrent.

Please keep seeding these files for as long as possible so that others may enjoy them too!


And finally: Yes, I'm aware of missing issues. If you have the original magazine of a missing issue, please contact retromags and oldgamemags websites to contribute!
